title: Modified Fibonacci - 4-Term Recurrence
statement:
You are given four initial integers F(0), F(1), F(2), and F(3), and a recurrence relation:

F(n) = F(n-1) + F(n-2) + F(n-3) + F(n-4) for n ≥ 4

Your task is to compute the value of F(n) modulo 10^9 + 7.
input_format:
The first line contains four space-separated integers: F(0), F(1), F(2), F(3).
The second line contains a single integer n (0 ≤ n ≤ 10^6).
output_format: Print a single integer — the value of F(n) modulo 10^9 + 7.
